pullRequest.title: [2.19.x] DDF-6013 G-5272 Allow users to remove themselves from the sharing list
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
Allows a user who does not want to see a workspace that has been shared with them anymore to be able to remove themselves from the sharing list.
Who is reviewing it?

Select relevant component teams:

Ask 2 committers to review/merge the PR and tag them here.
@bdeining
@stustison
How should this be tested?

build / unzip
before starting ddf go into /etc/ directory, update user.attributes file to include

"test" : {
       "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress":"test@localhost.local",
       "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/role": ["admin","manager","viewer","system-admin","systembundles"]
   }

and in user.properties files add
test=test,group,admin,manager,viewer,system-admin,systembundles,ssh


login with either admin user or test user with test as username/password
create workspace / result / search forms and share with another user (use test@localhost.local to share with test user), use different access types (read, write, share)
login user the user you shared the items with
verify the Leave Form/Workspace button removes user access
verify with owner of the form that nothing else has changed
share an item by group and verify that the user cannot leave the item

Any background context you want to provide?
What are the relevant tickets?
